description.value:
Nonmetallic armor coated with this oil has the ability to lessen the effectiveness of metallic weapons that strike it.

Apply corrosive oil to a set of nonmetallic armor that you wear. The next time a creature hits you with a metallic weapon, make the following attack: +26 vs. Reflex; on a hit, the attacker takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls with that weapon and a -8 penalty to damage rolls with that weapon (save ends both). Aftereffect: The attacker takes a -8 penalty to damage rolls made with that weapon (save ends).

Alchemical Item

Power - Consumable (Standard Action)

Apply corrosive oil to a set of nonmetallic armor that you wear. The next time a creature hits you with a metallic weapon, make the following attack: +26 vs. Reflex; on a hit, the attacker takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls with that weapon and a -8 penalty to damage rolls with that weapon (save ends both). Aftereffect: The attacker takes a -8 penalty to damage rolls made with that weapon (save ends).
